name: PlatFormer (grimbn)
description:
A level based 2D puzzle game where you create platforms to guide lovely little Tim to the end.

With various obstacles in his path you'll have to use your brain to find the perfect placement of blocks that help Tim run, jump and wall jump all the way to the goal.

Have Tim collect hard-to-reach-but-optional stars to unlock an alternate mode, where you only have a few blocks and limited amount of time to get Tim to the end. This mode will really test your understanding of Tim's middling outstanding acrobatic prowess!
